content.detailedDescription:
I would like to be hypnotized,to find out if what i seem to 'dream',is actually happening.It began back in 1988,( as far as i know).It seems like i have been aboard a 'craft',several times,over the years,with the most recent being approximately 2 weeks ago.I lived in georgia when it began happening.I now live in kentucky and it's still going on.I've only told my
partner about this.These 'dreams' were true,concerning what happened to my (now deceased)husband,and my niece.Since this site can be read by the public-i decline to give specific details.But if someone from your research team contacts me,i'd be more than happy to share information.Also i would be willing to take a lie detector test-just to get to the bottom of this.I am now 67 years old,and finally have the nerve to talk to a professional about this.My family doesn't know what's been happening to me.
it would only be my word.But i can describe the insides of the crafts,that i really do believe  i've been on.It has always been the 'grays',that i've seen.I was working on what appeared to be an assembly line,with them.I don't remember seeing any babies,however,it's possible that i did.I have seen many other humans,with me,in these dreams.I have awaken with my clothes,not put back on like i had them when i went to bed,and i 'saw' a gray standing by my bed,and i felt like i belonged to him,somehow.I used to dread going to bed when this first started,and as a result i started taking medicine to put me to sleep faster,becaude i could tell when they were coming.'i'll explain this to whomever i talk to.But over the years,i,somehow,lost that fear.I've also heard the humming of a craft leaving,after bringing me back.I will end this by asking for your help,to find out the truth.I have noticed that my every day memory,is getting worse.I also almost constantly hear a sound in my right ear,that appears to be a s strange sound wave.( only way that i can describe it)also,i did not keep dates and times,as i was too busy raising my children,taking care of my elder mother,and working  full time job.I just didn't tell anybody else about it.
content.summary: Did not see outside-only inside

content.detailedDescription: We were driving from dia to colorado springs. enjoying the lovely scenery i noticed a cigar like object in the sw sky. it was light blue/grey in color. it hovered as clouds went over it.I pointed it out to my friend. he said keep watching it as did he, best he could while driving. a cloud went over the cigar like object and it was gone. it did not appear before or after the cloud stream. i was very excited with my siting. i fully believe we witnessed a i do.
content.summary: Witnessed a cigar like object in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my kitchen making lunch and i noticed my neighbors (about 5 of them, one who is retired military) were all outside talking, pointing and looking at the sky, and one of them had binoculars. so i went out to see what was up. 

it was noon and the sky was absolutely clear of clouds. i observed was a spherical object moving across the sky, coming from the se, headed in a nw direction. it was moving at a steady speed, slower than a satellite, maybe as fast as an airplane that was really high (so i am guessing around 500-800 miles per hour). the object appeared to be higher than most aircraft fly around here, but still definitely within the atmosphere. it was extremely shiny. it glinted a lot as it reflected the bright noon-time sunshine. the light it reflected was white, which gave me the impression that the object was silvery and metallic. it was hard to make out any details other than light, but because it was so evenly reflective, it seemed like it must have had a smooth surface.

the object moved at a constant speed across much of the sky, all the way from the se horizon until almost to the nw horizon, in about 5 minutes time, until it stopped and just sat in one spot for about 10 minutes. it still seemed round and very shiny. i thought it was a single light, but my husband and my daughter thought they could sometimes see two "lights," very, very close together. it glinted a lot, like the object or the surface was moving ever so slightly, even while seemingly standing still. there was never a time when there was not light reflecting from the object; it just changed in intensity, like a silver beaded windchime blowing in the breeze (but without any visible change in direction).

after a bit, the object started to move again, toward the south, at the same speed as before. it soon went behind my neighbor's trees, from my vantage point, and the object was so far away and it was so bright outside that i couldn't find it again. after a bit, the neighbors lost it too and went back inside. 

during the sighting, there were no other aircraft in the sky (which is not very common around here, since the spokane airport and fairchild air force base are only about 10 miles away). however, about 10 minutes after the ufo disappeared, i noticed two airplanes in the sky (with an obvious airplane shape to each of them, as opposed to the ufo), and both left distinct contrails. the ufo had left no trails at all, even though it was traveling at jet speeds.

the ufo did not give off any sound that was audible to me, but neither did those two airplanes, so it doesn't mean the craft didn't make noise way up high. if i were to guess, i would say this object was larger than a boeing 747, but not more than twice as large.

after the sighting, it seemed like there was more airplane traffic than usual, but it may just been because we were looking to the sky more than usual. again, we live close to an airport and a base, so airplanes are common in our skies.

the thing that makes this sighting stand out to me is the fact that the object had been moving in a nw direction, stopped and hovered in one spot for several minutes, and then started moving in a s direction.
no airplane i have ever seen can hover like that, nor does it look round. drones have wings or arms for rotors, so they should look more irregular than a sphere, and they shouldn't be as large as this was. no helicopter i have ever seen appears to be silver and round and that large when that high in the air (one would have been a speck). the iss and satellites do not stop and then change direction.

i have never before seen a ufo and i was so shocked by this sighting that i watched, dumbfounded. i was worried i wouldn't be able to locate it again if i went for my camera, plus i wasn't sure if my camera would capture more than a glinty speck because the object was so far away. after the fact, i regret that i didn't dash quickly for my cell phone and get a video of this so as to share it with friends and family.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Highly reflective sphere moving across sky se-nw, hovers for 10 mins, resumes motion n-s

content.detailedDescription: We were driving from dia to colorado springs. enjoying the lovely scenery i noticed a cigar like object in the sw sky. it was light blue/grey in color. it hovered as clouds went over it.I pointed it out to my friend. he said keep watching it as did he, best he could while driving. a cloud went over the cigar like object and it was gone. it did not appear before or after the cloud stream. i was very excited with my siting. i fully believe we witnessed a i do.
content.summary: Witnessed a cigar like object in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just returned from a ski trip from south shore lake tahoe with a group of college friends the previous day, and my normal sleep routine had been interrupted thanks to the long 4-day weekend.  i was having trouble falling asleep, and found myself tossing and turning for about an hour from 2-3am.  at about 3am, something turned my attention to the window.  i generally have a very view of the sky because my window directly faces a middle school which typically does not pollute too much light, therefore i'm used to seeing all sorts of things cruise by each night that i am readily able to identify.  that being said, i think that it's also important to note that i have always been a ufo skeptic--which is why it was hard for me to believe what i was seeing.  at about 3:05am i saw movement in the corner of my eye.  i got out of bed and gave my full attention to the object.  i shook my head for a second and rubbed my eyes because i thought that the unusual flight path of the object was being caused by having just sat up out of bed or some strange visual adjustment my eyes were doing.  that wasn't the case, as i witnessed the same flight pattern long after i gave my eyes sufficient time to adjust and focus on the object.  my mind could not make sense of the event because the object didn't follow any flight path i've ever witnessed--including meteorites and the like.  the light emitting from it was not static, and seemed to change intensity with the fluid shifts in direction the object was making.  it wasn't erratic, it was an almost fluid-like dance that seemed to obey some sort of intuitive yet beyond comprehension law of nature.  that's the best way to describe it.  it's movement didn't seem to be efficient relative to my basic understanding of physics, yet there was a powerful sense that it in fact was more so.  

it's movement was this pattern: __|--|__|--|__|--|__ and lasted for about 25 seconds after which the light gradually faded and i lost sight of it.
content.summary: Object with pulsating light emission and a truly confounding flight path

content.detailedDescription:
On january 21, 2014 in winder, georgia i was sitting at my computer, right above my computer is my surveillance camera monitor. my camera motion by the front door went off because something caused my motion lights to turn on. so i'm watching camera 3, then as i'm watching i see this strange light appear in camera 6, circle and then go away. it wasn't a flash light, it moved from east and then circled west and then disappeared. the time of the video when this was captured is 02:41:49 i woke up my wife to show her what i saw and posted the video on youtube..Here is the link: [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
like i said i'm not sure what i saw, but it wasn't something i had imagined.
content.summary: An odd circle of light appeared in my surveillance camera at 2:41:49 a.M.

content.detailedDescription:
I took this picture around 1pm on the beach in the cancun hotel zone standing in front of the bay view grand condos looking south.
i did not notice the purple object in the picture until i uploaded it on my laptop. it looks like an upside down jellyfish.
i used a kodak 3x digital zoom camera on the "auto" setting.
i contacted jan c. harzan and she said to send it to you for analysis.
thanks,
cindi
content.summary: Photo

content.detailedDescription:
I am fifty eight years old and retired,living in rowlett texas. i am retired from state government and former assistant attorney general for the state of vermont.  i'm married forty years with no substance abuse or mental health issues.

on october 22, 2013 i sought treatment at the va hospital, north dallas, for excruciating pain in my right knee.   they x-rayed my right knee and repeated the exam twice.  they x-rayed my left knee for comparison and also did a sonogram.  i overheard the radiologist say "what are those?" when he and a tech were reviewing my films.  i was asked about shrapnel wounds or other injuries to my right knee.  there have been none, my right knee has never suffered a significant injury.  the doctor was candid and showed the objects on the x-ray film to my wife and i.  there is no scar corresponding to the location.  the radiologist's report characterized the x-ray as "abnormal."  

the er doctor said she had "never seen anything like it on film."  i was supposed to have an appointment with the va to follow-up with an orthopedic specialist.  that never happened.  the va did recall me to the hospital on november 7th and took several films of my knees from a standing position.

using my search engine, i found a guy in houston who claimed to be an expert in such matters.  i saw him.  his doctor reviewed my films and said they were "very rare" and "consistent with legitimate alien implants discovered by dr. lier and derryle sims.


i have several ufo experiences, nightmares, flashbacks, incidents of blood on my pillowcase in the morning without a corresponding injury.
content.summary: Implant in my right knee.  metallic, no portal of entry, 1 1/2 deep

content.detailedDescription:
I was at work, went outside to smoke. i look at the night sky every chance i get. i came out the door at 11:25pm and noticed the moon was low on the horizon and as i was looking at the moon i saw a bright white light cruising across the sky crossing a little below the face of the moon from my vantage point heading north-northwest. i thought it was the i.S.S. so i went into my truck which was right outside the door and grabbed my binoculars to look at it. only when i had the binoculars did i see the triangle shape and the 3 lights, one on each corner. the front light was a solid white light,  never wavering or change of color. the back 2 lights were randomly changing from white, red, and blue. i followed the object for 40 seconds until it disappeared behind the trees obstructing my view. it made no sound. and now thinking back on it, the brightness of the object was i.S.S.-like but the object was bigger because it was way closer than the i.S.S. i have no doubt of what i saw. it was not an airplane, satellite,  shooting star, etc. i saw it clear as day through those lenses. if you have other witnesses of this event or need anymore details from me please do not hesitate to contact me.

thanks, zach kappler
content.summary: Thought it was i.S.S. (bright)grabbed binoculars.  saw it up close and personal.

content.detailedDescription: Was looking over an apartment at all the stars. from my point of view, jupiter and sirrus were to my left. i was facing se (mostly east). at first sight, it was like an esclipse of the sun without the flares of light. the lights appeared somewhat like streaks then because focused. was in a complete circle of about 12 lights with the horizontal plane (east to west) being the brightest. all lights were faintly shimmering. it did not move in any way and was there for about 2 minutes. my friend who was standing there (on his cell phone) also saw this when i pointed to it.  the sky was very clear, no clouds at all. the object appeared over an apartment such that i had a very clear view of this object well over the roof top. i am quite certain of what i saw. i had just arrived at this location, had not been drinking or otherwise impaired. i clearly saw this circle of lights and have no doubts what so ever this was nothing made by humans that i know of. i couldn't tell distance therefore the size but it was about how a full moon would be at the top of its skyward path over head. this went on for about 2 minutes. i glanced away, looked back and it was gone. didn't have time to shoot a picture with my cell doubt it would have shown up.
content.summary: About 12 lights in a circle, would have been size of moon at 12 o'clock position in its orbital path

content.detailedDescription: While driving home from work right as the sun was going down there is a   large open field off the road that you can see a long way across.  as i was driving past it a bright light just above the horizon caught my attention.  at first i thought it must be a reflection on the clouds from the sun for it was really bright as it was setting.  but that couldn't be it, there was too much space of clouds between the sun and the light or the other clouds would have had reflections on them as well. it was in an opening just in the edge of the clouds. i rolled down my window and snapped two pictures just as i was getting to the end of the open field. it was still there as i continued on. i didn't know what i had just seen but i knew it wasn't anything usual. when i got home just a few minutes later i immediately showed the pictures to my wife explaining what i had just seen.  as she was looking at the pictures she said i wasn't going to believe it but she too had seen a bright light at the same approximate time.  because we live on a hill and our windows face the west, she said a bright light caught her attention too thru a silhouette of trees, it was long shaped just like in the pictures. she just assumed it was some sort of reflection off a limb or something playing tricks on her eyes. upon viewing the pictures, when you zoom in on the light it definitely has a solid shape to it, kind of a fuzzy or reflective disc shape.
content.summary: Driving home from work near sunset a bright light in sky caught my attention.

content.detailedDescription: At 9:10 pm went outside to head to work.  looked up and noticed a dark triangular object moving across the sky from east to west. the object had two sets of lights stacked on top of each other like a double decker bus.  one single red light was flashing below.  as i watched the object made an abrupt turn to the south.  i live near the traffic pattern for atlanta int airport so i am used to seeing jets fly over pretty often but not on the heading mentioned. i am also a private pilot so i know the normal navigation lighting of aircraft.
content.summary: Stacked lights moved across the sky. not normal aircraft lights. i'm a private pilot.

content.detailedDescription: On january 20,2014 at (1810hrs) 6:10 pm pacific time i went outside to smoke a cigarette.It was a clear night and i could see stars.I looked n.E. approximately and noticed 2 star like objects about 40 degrees above the horizon.When i go out to smoke i always watch the sky and have seen iss/spaceshuttle and shooting stars many times.Immediately when noticing these 2 objects i realized they shouldnt be there.They appeared to be outside earths atmosphere and seemed to be like any of the brightest stars.Maybe a little bigger.The objects were pretty close together.That is why i noticed them as they looked like stars and there arent 2 in the sky like that as close to each other.They did not move at all in any direction.As i watched them they suddenly seemed to be dimming although in a very unusual way that is very hard to describe.It just looked very weird.Not that they were just dimming but the immediate area around them was being affected also.I witnessed these for approximately 1 min. with the last 15 seconds being the weird dimming part.I hope someone else witnessed this as i have never seen anything like it.
content.summary: 2 starlike objects that weirdly faded out.

content.detailedDescription: I noticed lights blinking through the window. me and my wife looked out of the window and seen the lights hovering about 100 feet in the back yard. it flew to the graveyard hardshell cemetary and then took off at a 90 degree angle and disappeared.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Noticed lights then light changed direction and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: El dia 17 de enero, encontrandome con mi familia en la localidad de san esteban, a pocos kilometros de capilla del monte, registro una secuencia de 6 fotografias de cerro uritorco. al descargarlas a dia siguiente en mi notebook advierto en una de las fotografias dos objetos que no habia obsrvado a simple vista. someto la misma a ampliaciones y filtros pudiendo corroborar que se trataba de objetos solidos por encima de la ladera norte del cerro.
content.summary: Fue registrado con camara digital. no era visible a simple vista

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i went camping the weekend of 9/21/13. we are hangglider pilots. we were going to villa grove,co. to get some flying in. we were early and set up camp that friday...We drove up to launch near hayden pass and came across what looked to me to be a mutilation... eye was surgically removed,jaw flesh surgically removed, no blood, no animal tracks...I don't know....
content.summary: Animal mutilation

content.detailedDescription:
My husband, 25 yr.Old son and i are home..Mostly watching t.V. during the evenings and approximately january 2, 2014, 2 weeks ago my husband spotted this bright object that blinks red in the sky because it was so bright and it was slowly ascending and descending for approximately 2 hours (he thought that it was the space station..But we located the space station just north of this object)we watched it for 2 hours to see what it may do. then all of a sudden it is gone!!!  it has come back every evening since the initial sighting. (except for one night, it was raining extremely hard) it may have been there but we couldn't see it

you don't really see it fly in...It is not there one minute...Then it is...It stays for approx. 2 hours and then...It is not there anymore.

it doesn't make you feel any certain way except for curious.

why is it out there...How did it get there and how does it leave without you seeing it come or go!
content.summary: Hovers every night from 10:45 p.M. to 12:45a.M. for last 2 weeks

content.detailedDescription: First noticed the object through a sky light from inside our family room as we were watching tv.  being near an airport we frequently see planes and helicopters in the sky but this light behaved quite different.  the object moved in a straight line path to the north north east but wavered and varied its speed ever so slightly.  after moving out onto the deck there was no noticable engine sound or flashing lights.  my wife was able to snap a few camera shots with a point and shoot. the object seemed to have a "glow" or slight aura to it not a crisp light like an aircraft would have.  i ran back in to try and get a video of it and lost sight of it by the time i got back on the deck.  we viewed the object for about 5 mins, maybe less.  there is obviously some camera shake in the photos due to the low light and cold temperatures but compared to the stars in the back ground the object seems to be moving in an odd pattern.
content.summary: Red orange light in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north on hwy 81 with my family. i noticed a fast low moving object in the dark just to the west of me zoom past my car to the east.  at first i thought it was a cars tail lights on an approaching over pass however there was no over pass.  the object speed off at an amazing rate of speed.  i could not see any shape only light.  i saw it as red light, my front passenger saw it as white light. we argued over what we saw and the color of it but we both agreed we had seen something dart over our car.
content.summary: Object flies over car on hwy 81 at night

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving a meeting around 9pm, when i looked up and saw a glowing diamond shaped object above a middle school, it appeared to slowly vanish, a minute later i saw an identical object heading in the same direction, only to have it slowly vanish, no blinking lights, no sound, altitude of only several hundred feet.I went to the l.I sound to see if i could see them, i did not, only the usual air traffic, which makes noise, has running lights, and flies in an orderly fashion. when i was returning home, i noticed a bright lite going in the same direction (west) as myself, i pulled over to get a better look, as i stopped it stopped,it changed direction and flew directly over head, so it started out heading west, then changed direction and headed north, absolutely no sound! ive report this to you before but no one contacted me??  chris
content.summary: Two silent diamond shaped objects, followed an hour late by very bright object

content.detailedDescription:
In early 1975 i was a patient at the shriners hospital in salt lake city, ut. i was 15 years when this incident happened.

the hospital is on the side of a mountain in the northeast side of the city. i was in a ward that had a panoramic view of the entire valley. my childhood dream was to become a pilot and i loved watching airplanes coming and going from the slc international airport at night. (about two years later i had my private pilots license and later became a corporate pilot.)

 i was watching the airplanes at the airport on a clear night. i would guess it to be around 10pm at night. the airport was maybe 8-10 miles from the hospital. about another 15 miles wsw of the airport is the large kennecott strip copper mine. i began to notice these round orange objects that seemed to be hovering near the mine. given the distance of around 25 miles from the hospital, these lights had to be extremely bright. the number kept changing from just one or two, to as many as six or seven. other kids on my side of the ward also started watching them after i pointed them out. i also called to a nurses aid to come and look at the lights.

this went on for around 15-20 minutes. the lights would appear somewhat slowly, they just didn't flash on, and they disappeared in the same way. i knew these were not airplanes or helicopters. 
gradually the number of lights diminished down to 1 or 2 and then there was nothing. after a few minutes of not seeing any lights everyone lost interest and started going asleep. i closely watched for another 30 minutes without seeing anything else.

this incident has been in the back of my mind all these years. i often wonder if anyone else near the kennecott mine saw the lights. if you have any information from this time period regarding these lights, or orbs, i would like to know.
content.summary: Orbs over copper mine west of salt lake city, ut in mid 70's

content.detailedDescription: January 15 my husband received a phone call at 8:21 pm from his brother that lives 20 miles away telling us to look outside in the sky. his brother is in local law enforcement and had never seen anything like this. my mother-in-law, husband, and i walked outside and saw the object heading our direction from the north east. it took the object about 1 minute to become completely visible above our house. it was a series of 7 lights following equal distance from one another heading west toward shreveport. the lights were all blinking red except the center light, this one was a solid white light. these objects were very bright and we all could tell that it was something we couldn't explain. to me, it looked connected and it never flew by any other light source to see through or behind the objects. it never seemed threatening and my family seemed to be the only people outside to witness this experience. after the object was out of view, i called the local authorities and reported my experience. i was told that nothing of that nature had been reported that night and they would follow up on my report. we continued to watch the sky on and off throughout the hour and we watched a few helicopters make their way across the night sky. this was not my first encounter with a unidentified flying object, but my first time reporting an experience. i am an avid alien astronaut theorist, and all i can say is that i will continue to look up.
content.summary: Seven strange lights either connected or synchronized in line equal distance, no noise, in the center light was white and all others were red. middle light wasn't blinking, others were. a mile long.

content.detailedDescription:
One summer night in 2004 three friends and i decided to meetup in the woodlawn cemetery of saskatoon sometime after midnight maybe even 3 am because i remember the horizon in the east was lit up with the approaching sun.
 our intention was to visit and tell ghost stories not sky watch. we sat on some benches located directly down from the street entrance to the cemetery, the area there has very little trees and a great view of the sky with little light pollution. after about 20 minutes to half an hour we all noticed a strobe like white light  above us at an angle positioned just a little ways from us towards the west side, it flashed a few times  about  4  to 5 times in no particular order after it was done flashing a bright red light flashed towards downtown it was so fast that it emitted a tail, flew like a comet but was a solid bright red then minutes later a blue strobe like light moved towards the north end, just a few times but was big flashes almost like lighting strikes and also was a very rich blue color. a few more minutes passed by and then from the west where the first white light was flashing came 2 star like dull lights. at first we thought they were following each other but then we noticed they were so in sync that they must belong to the same craft. not once did the lights ever go out of sync so we decided that the ufo was cigar shaped but you could not see it's outline. this cigar shaped ufo hovered very slowly towards the east side in what seemed to take about 2 minutes to fly directly over us and fade out towards the eastern horizon. my friends and i stayed there for another 30 minutes to see if we would see anything else but did not. these lights in the sky were all about airplane height.
content.summary: Cigar shaped ufo over woodlawn cemetery in saskatoon. 2004

content.detailedDescription:
1 i was traveling on a train from edinburgh to london kings cross station.
2 early in the journey between north berwick and dunbar i noticed a very bright object low down in the sky and then i noticed another identical object about 200 feet behind it - both were 'rising' when i saw them.
3 i first thought the object(s) looked like loose windsocks (!) or balloons - it was the tube shape that i could not comprehend - these rising / hovering objects then started to fly with 'purpose' - they were not being blown about in the wind.
4 the first object was rising at about a 30 degree angle - the other object was some distance behind the first but soon caught up with it. both objects flew together but not in close proximity to one another. i observed the objects from the train flying above fields and then they flew upwards into the clouds - the whole sighting must have lasted only 5 minutes.
5 i was absolutely amazed / confused at what i saw - and i have been finding hard to stop thinking about my experience. i was tempted to speak to other passengers on the train to ensure that i wasn't imagining things - but i decided to keep taking photos and a video rather than lose sight of the objects and miss out on what i considered to be a one off photo opportunity. i managed to take photographs and a video on my iphone 5 - the video was a bit shaky and i eventually managed to zoom into one of the objects. i felt odd whilst watching these objects - but exhilarated at the same time.
6 i lost sight of the objects when they rose up into the clouds.
content.summary: Two saucer / tube like objects hovering then flying upwardsinto the clouds

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo sighting. january 18, 2014 at 2150 hours.
my wife first witnessed the object from our deck, just outside the laundry
room where i was folding clothes. she called for me to come outside quick.
she pointed at the sky and i looked almost directly overhead and saw what
looked like a meteor or something falling from the sky on fire. it looked
like a bright fire bal, but it never diminished and kept moving at a
constant speed from north to south across the sky. after about 8 to 10
seconds another silent bright orange round object came overhead going in the
exact same direction at the same speed as the first.  after another 8 to 10
seconds a third object just like the others followed behind them. they
had to be several miles apart, but appeared to be forming a triangle shape
as they moved away from us to the south. after a 10 to 12 second interval a
fourth object followed the same path then another for a total of five
objects. they were all visible for a good 30 to 40 seconds before they
disappeared behind a tree line. the entire event lasted about 2 minutes.
everyone in the house was able to see them (2 children 3 adults). they
didn't appear to be at a very high altitude (around 5000 feet).
content.summary: Five round, bright, low flying objects flying silently from north to south 8 to 10 seconds apart at constant speed.

content.detailedDescription: Someone else saw this and texted me about it immediately, so i'm posting this for them.
content.summary: Wife texted me that she saw this object

content.detailedDescription:
I pulled up to the red light at 1825 and 10th (i was on 10th, about to make a right onto 1825 to drive through pflugerville toward fm 685) at 7:20pm. i know the exact time because i was on my way to pick up my daughter. there was a car already stopped in the right turn lane, a silver lexus(?) with two adult women in the front. as soon as i stopped, i noticed in the sky ahead of me, around 45-50 degrees above the horizon to the north east, lights in the sky off in the distance. it only took a second or two to see that they were lights scattered around the edge of a triangular shape whose darker silhouette could be made out against the sky. it appeared to be slowly rotating as if almost standing on end and turning it's flat edge toward me. i rolled down my car window and pointed up at it, turned to the two women in the car next to me and asked if they were seeing it. they indicated they had been watching it for a minute or two already. i watched for a few more seconds, then the light changed and i drove forward and took a right onto 1825. i could still see it in between the buildings of the elementary school for a few seconds then it appeared to vanish. i thought i'd have a better view of it once i turned left onto 685 toward hutto, but there was nothing to be seen.

i'm having a hard time describing the lights around the edge. they were not like regular bright pinpoint airplane lights, they were more whitish orange, and seemed larger. the object itself appeared to be around a mile away, and very large, however it was kind of hard to judge distance so it could have been more. i did have an impression of immense size however, like something moving pretty slowly, that was very big. i wish i'd had the presence of mind to try to take a photo or ask for the two women's contact numbers, but i did not. the lights on the object were one of the reasons i thought it was far away - they looked very large, and indistinct as though off in the distance, plus i could see the darker shape of whatever they were attached to in-between them.

the other reason that i'm pretty sure about what i saw is that i run a lot at night, and can always see planes in a holding pattern or approaching to land near and around where we live, and over toward taylor, hutto and parts of pflugerville. these lights were nothing at all like the plane lights i'm used to seeing - they were lower, moving slower, were larger and completely different in terms of brightness. it was a very bright, clear night.

i've attached a map showing where my car was stopped, and the direction i was facing when i saw it.
content.summary: Large triaangular shape in night sky, lights around edges, appeared to be stationary, rotating slowly, very big

content.detailedDescription: 4 of us were doing work after hurricane ike we were camping 10 miles north of silsbee texas around 10 oclock one night we noticed 1 light shining on us treetop high about 40 yards away we could not see what was behind the light we argued with each other about what it was for around 15 minutes until one of us started to walk toward it it move east around 50 yards to the other side of the property when i tried to walk toward it again it slowly moved away out of sight we did not know what to think about it shortly after we went to sleep.About a week later one of us seen a large blacker than night 9to10 feet tall head and shoulder mass for a second(at night)i seen it every other week for a couple of months then i started to see it 2to3 seconds before it disappeared into the trees this happened for a few more months until one night while using the out house it popped out of the tree line behind a large pile of brush then moved around a second pile emerging from behind it then stopped facing me by that time i had finished my business and was looking at this thing about 30 yards away i yelled at it saying i have jesus in my heart i not scared of you then turned and ran like scared little boy back to our trailer.At this time there was only 2 of us left down there working i never told the guys what i saw until i returned home shortly after the last encounter never seen it since.I have seen and heard some other really weird shit since returning home i dont know whats going on in texas but it makes me wonder
content.summary: 4 of us observed an object observing us treetop high very close all we can see is a light no noise  aprox 15min slowly moved away when aproached 1 of us encounterd a large entity multipul times over 9 mo period on the property

content.detailedDescription: At the night of my first encounter if seeing the ufo i was infront of my porch taking a cigarette break. i happened to look northwest of my home and there it was. this was my first encounter with a ufoin december. after i seen the ufo it has been hovering over top of my house every night ever since the encounter. i alsi should inform you that the ufo would not leave me alone. every where i walk it follows me i cant walk to the store without seeing the object hovering above my head. a few nights ago on the 16th of january the same ufo that have been seeing for a while decided to land closer to the ground. i was walking west this night and the ufo was heading east the direction of my home. this night was the first night that it followed me and came close hovered 5 feet from where i was standing it had four different close the lights ranged from white, purple,red, and green. this was the night when i was positive that it was a ufo. ever since i seen it that night i have been scared to death. i cant even walk to the store or stand infront of my porch and smoke a cigarette. i wrote this report to see if someone can contact me abso i can get them to stop watching me. when ever i try to get a photo they follow me even more
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ever since last month around the middle of december i spotted ufo. after that night it has been hovering over my apartment building every night  after the first sighting. when ever i move the ufo moves even closer to where i am standing everynight.

content.detailedDescription:
The night of apollo 14

 for an extended winter break from college, i planned a trip to fort lauderdale florida, and to put some miles on my brand new red corvette  
which was equipped with t-tops. a friend came with me , and we took shifts driving, so we could make the trip in 24 hours straight. it was a lot of fun to drive from the connecticut cold winter snow and ice,right into the warm summer-like sunshine of south florida. i had never been there before, and the beaches were so beautiful.
 for the trip back home, i drove up to daytona and drove around on the beach just like a dune buggy. i suddenly got stuck on a mound of sand . then some friendly citizens pushed me off the hill of sand, and we all had lots of laughs ! we heard that the apollo 14 manned mission to the moon was lifting off at the kennedy space center that evening. we were heading that way  so we decided it would be really cool to witness this in person ! there was so much traffic going up there, and so many crowds of people when i arrived there. there was a great feeling of anticipation and a greater feeling of excitement when  saturn v launched at around 4;00 pm. with powerful fires blasting from below, the rocket spacecraft lifted up into the sky. the intensity and magnitude of the thrust generated that propelled  the space craft upward, ascending into the heavens as it loomed so high, continuing until it was so far out of sight. it was breathtaking to witness! it was all so very magnificent!
 when leaving ksc it was very tough dealing with all of the crowds and all of the traffic. i got a kick out of hearing cousin brucie, a new york radio host, on my radio, but my left leg was aching because of constantly depressing my heavy duty clutch ! the traffic lightened ,and the night got darker, 
 i headed up north interstate 95 into georgia, traveling through a very heavily wooded area. my co-pilot was sound asleep and there were no other cars on the road. around midnight, as i was driving up the lonely road, i suddenly noticed southwest to my left, the moon appearing full, and bright white,like a toy marble high up in the very dark black night sky. as i drove ahead, i could see the silhouettes of the tall trees, dancing across the moon, which peeked out and flickered from behind the branches. what a beautiful sight!   
 the moon kept attracting my attention, and i alternately kept looking to my left at the moon, and then looking forward up the road ahead. as this continued, it seemed as though the moon was keeping up with me as i drove. when i looked again, in the clearings between the trees, the moon looked not only like it was following me, but it appeared to be getting closer and closer, as it descended, brighter and brighter, in stark contrast to the deep black night sky ! each time i faced it, the moon was getting closer and closer, bigger and bigger, now it was still oddly silent  heading straight toward me and the earth ! i thought this was the end of the earth, and we were all going to die ! the moon had grown in size to about what looked like 100 feet across in width and diameter, casting a blinding white light surface. i panicked, overcome with fear, i jammed my right elbow into my friend's arm and i shouted , "wake up, we're going to die, because the moon is going to smash into the earth right now !" i have never been so terrified in all my life! i was so overcome with the emotion of fear and dread that i was swerving the car from left to right driving up the road looking left at the site and again forward up the road, but thankfully i maintained control of the car!   
 suddenly i heard the sound of a siren from behind my car, and instantly i looked in my rear view mirror, and to my amazement i saw the flashing lights of a police car following behind me !  instinctively, i slowed  down, and pulled over and stopped the car !  immediately i noticed all signs of the giant-sized bright white "moon" had totally vanished without a trace. i was shocked at how fast it was gone, and the doom of the impending colossal disaster was over ! i breathed a grateful sigh of relief. in a moment, i wondered what is going to happen now with this cop?
 although the overwhelming event seemed done,i was still highly charged with the emotions of fear and astonishment. i suddenly realized that what 
i had just experienced was a ufo sighting, and the possibly of alien contact, or worse, an alien abduction! i was very grateful, and still very excited and highly emotional.
  turning left to the rear, i watched as the patrolman approached my car. i lowered my window and he said to me "let me see your license and registration boy." still very excited, i said "did you see that?" he said, "see what?" i said "it looked like the moon was going to smash into the earth and we were all going to die!" he said "no, i didn't see that. what i saw was you driving side to side down the road. that's why i pulled you over and stopped you." i then said "i can't believe you didn't see it? what do you think it was?" the police officer said ,"what you saw was probably a rocket they shot off down south. i'm going to let you go, and just drive carefully." i said, "thank you officer", and we parted ways.
 that was it, the ordeal was totally over. i asked my friend if he saw it? and he said yes, he did see it.I did not want to argue with the police officer, but that was no rocket, as i had seen one fire off that very same day, and it was absolutely not anything alike.
 whenever i told anyone about it, they respond in a very uncomfortable way for me and they have a way, of dismissing the incident as never happening, and addressing me in a condescending patronizing manner, condemning my real life experience as nothing, and that i'm wacky , and the whole story is very laughable. i keep it quiet because it's a real drag getting disrespected.
i think people are conditioned by the main stream media and the government propaganda machine to not take this seriously.
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.summary: I witnessed a huge white ball descending toward my car,driving home ,the night i watched apollo 14 lift off .
